c74object.name: wa.launchpad.column
c74object.description:
All buttons of a column of a launchpad mini used to represent values from 0 to 8 (inclusive)
The button will light uo from top to buttom depending on the current value.
If a button is pressed the current value is set and send by the output.
Use the topmost function button to set the value to zero

entry.name: value
entry.description: the current value as selected by a button press or passed on from ther input

objarg.name: col
objarg.description: all buttons in this column will be used, including the sytem button

objarg.name: color
objarg.description: For a givven value the corresponding numbers of buttons wioll be light in this color
